description: The ' User Connection has recovered from failed/downed state
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD STRATACOM-STRATAVIEW-SVPLUS-MIB::userConnCleared STRATACOM-STRATAVIEW-SVPLUS-MIB::lastSequenceNumber i 9999 STRATACOM-STRATAVIEW-SVPLUS-MIB::connectionLocalEndPt o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 STRATACOM-STRATAVIEW-SVPLUS-MIB::connectionLocalStr s EXAMPLE STRATACOM-STRATAVIEW-SVPLUS-MIB::connectionRemoteEndPt o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 STRATACOM-STRATAVIEW-SVPLUS-MIB::connectionRemoteStr s EXAMPLE STRATACOM-STRATAVIEW-SVPLUS-MIB::connectionOpStatus i 1 STRATACOM-STRATAVIEW-SVPLUS-MIB::connectionAbitStatus i 1 STRATACOM-STRATAVIEW-SVPLUS-MIB::connectionType i 1

description: The Sequence Number of the last trap generated on the SNMP Proxy
variables.name: STRATACOM-STRATAVIEW-SVPLUS-MIB::lastSequenceNumber

description: The object identifier of the 1st attribute of the end point
in the associated protocol specific end point table.
variables.name: STRATACOM-STRATAVIEW-SVPLUS-MIB::connectionLocalEndPt

description: The Local EndPt information in string format.
i.e., the instance information of the EndPt.
Framerelay Endpt is displayed as:
node.shelf.slot.line.port.dlci
Atm Endpt is displayed as:
node.shelf.slot.port.vpi.vci
shelf is 0 for Endpt on a routing node.
variables.name: STRATACOM-STRATAVIEW-SVPLUS-MIB::connectionLocalStr

description: The object identifier of the 1st attribute of the end point
in the associated protocol specific end point table.
variables.name: STRATACOM-STRATAVIEW-SVPLUS-MIB::connectionRemoteEndPt

description: The Remote EndPt information in string format.
i.e., the instance information of the EndPt.
Framerelay Endpt is displayed as:
node.shelf.slot.line.port.dlci
Atm Endpt is displayed as:
node.shelf.slot.port.vpi.vci
shelf is 0 for Endpt on a routing node.
variables.name: STRATACOM-STRATAVIEW-SVPLUS-MIB::connectionRemoteStr

description: A operation status of the connection. 'incomplete' indicates
that the some segments of the connection exist but others may
be in an unknown or non-existant state.
variables.name: STRATACOM-STRATAVIEW-SVPLUS-MIB::connectionOpStatus

description: A-bit status of the connection.
variables.name: STRATACOM-STRATAVIEW-SVPLUS-MIB::connectionAbitStatus

description: Connection Type.
fr indicates Framerelay to Framerelay connection.
atm indicates Atm to Atm connection and
atm-fr indicates Atm to FrameRelay connection.
unknown indicates incomplete connection.
variables.name: STRATACOM-STRATAVIEW-SVPLUS-MIB::connectionType

description: The User Connection has failed
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD STRATACOM-STRATAVIEW-SVPLUS-MIB::userConnFailed STRATACOM-STRATAVIEW-SVPLUS-MIB::lastSequenceNumber i 9999 STRATACOM-STRATAVIEW-SVPLUS-MIB::connectionLocalEndPt o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 STRATACOM-STRATAVIEW-SVPLUS-MIB::connectionLocalStr s EXAMPLE STRATACOM-STRATAVIEW-SVPLUS-MIB::connectionRemoteEndPt o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 STRATACOM-STRATAVIEW-SVPLUS-MIB::connectionRemoteStr s EXAMPLE STRATACOM-STRATAVIEW-SVPLUS-MIB::connectionOpStatus i 1 STRATACOM-STRATAVIEW-SVPLUS-MIB::connectionAbitStatus i 1 STRATACOM-STRATAVIEW-SVPLUS-MIB::connectionType i 1
